verses.verse: Hear <WH8085>, ye children <WH1121>, the instruction <WH4148> of a father <WH1>, and attend <WH7181> to know <WH3045> understanding <WH998>.
For I give <WH5414> you good <WH2896> doctrine <WH3948>, forsake <WH5800> ye not my law <WH8451>.
For I was my father's <WH1> son <WH1121>, tender <WH7390> and only <WH3173> beloved in the sight <WH6440> of my mother <WH517>.
He taught <WH3384> me also, and said <WH559> unto me, Let thine heart <WH3820> retain <WH8551> my words <WH1697>: keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687>, and live <WH2421>.
Get <WH7069> wisdom <WH2451>, get <WH7069> understanding <WH998>: forget <WH7911> it not; neither decline <WH5186> from the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>.
Forsake <WH5800> her not, and she shall preserve <WH8104> thee: love <WH157> her, and she shall keep <WH5341> thee.
Wisdom <WH2451> is the principal thing <WH7225>; therefore get <WH7069> wisdom <WH2451>: and with all thy getting <WH7075> get understanding <WH998>.
Exalt <WH5549> her, and she shall promote <WH7311> thee: she shall bring thee to honour <WH3513>, when thou dost embrace <WH2263> her.

She shall give <WH5414> to thine head <WH7218> an ornament <WH3880> of grace <WH2580>: a crown <WH5850> of glory <WH8597> shall she deliver <WH4042> to thee. a crown: or, she shall compass thee with a crown of glory
Hear <WH8085>, O my son <WH1121>, and receive <WH3947> my sayings <WH561>; and the years <WH8141> of thy life <WH2416> shall be many <WH7235>.
I have taught <WH3384> thee in the way <WH1870> of wisdom <WH2451>; I have led <WH1869> thee in right <WH3476> paths <WH4570>.
When thou goest <WH3212>, thy steps <WH6806> shall not be straitened <WH3334>; and when thou runnest <WH7323>, thou shalt not stumble <WH3782>.
Take fast hold <WH2388> of instruction <WH4148>; let her not go <WH7503>: keep <WH5341> her; for she is thy life <WH2416>.
Enter <WH935> not into the path <WH734> of the wicked <WH7563>, and go <WH833> not in the way <WH1870> of evil <WH7451> men.
Avoid <WH6544> it, pass <WH5674> not by it, turn <WH7847> from it, and pass away <WH5674>.
For they sleep <WH3462> not, except they have done mischief <WH7489>; and their sleep <WH8142> is taken away <WH1497>, unless they cause some to fall <WH3782> <WH3782>.
For they eat <WH3898> the bread <WH3899> of wickedness <WH7562>, and drink <WH8354> the wine <WH3196> of violence <WH2555>.
But the path <WH734> of the just <WH6662> is as the shining <WH5051> light <WH216>, that shineth <WH215> more <WH1980> and more unto the perfect <WH3559> day <WH3117>.
The way <WH1870> of the wicked <WH7563> is as darkness <WH653>: they know <WH3045> not at what they stumble <WH3782>.
My son <WH1121>, attend <WH7181> to my words <WH1697>; incline <WH5186> thine ear <WH241> unto my sayings <WH561>.
Let them not depart <WH3868> from thine eyes <WH5869>; keep <WH8104> them in the midst <WH8432> of thine heart <WH3824>.
For they are life <WH2416> unto those that find <WH4672> them, and health <WH4832> to all their flesh <WH1320>. health: Heb. medicine
Keep <WH5341> thy heart <WH3820> with all diligence <WH4929>; for out of it are the issues <WH8444> of life <WH2416>. with: Heb. above all keeping
Put away <WH5493> from thee a froward <WH6143> mouth <WH6310>, and perverse <WH3891> lips <WH8193> put far <WH7368> from thee. a froward: Heb. frowardness of mouth and perverseness of lips
Let thine eyes <WH5869> look <WH5027> right on <WH5227>, and let thine eyelids <WH6079> look straight <WH3474> before thee.
Ponder <WH6424> the path <WH4570> of thy feet <WH7272>, and let all thy ways <WH1870> be established <WH3559>. let: or, all thy ways shall be ordered aright
Turn <WH5186> not to the right hand <WH3225> nor to the left <WH8040>: remove <WH5493> thy foot <WH7272> from evil <WH7451>.
